peripheral.name: TIMER
peripheral.description: Programmable Timers. See EE User's Manual, Chapter 4.

register.name: T0_MODE
register.description: Register for setting modes and reading status

enumeratedValue.name: LOW
enumeratedValue.description: Counts while the gate signal is low.

enumeratedValue.name: RISING
enumeratedValue.description: Resets and starts counting at the gate signal's rising edge.

enumeratedValue.name: FALLING
enumeratedValue.description: Resets and starts counting at the gate signal's falling edge.

enumeratedValue.name: BOTH
enumeratedValue.description: Resets and starts counting at both edges of the gate signal.

enumeratedValue.name: Disabled
enumeratedValue.description: The counter keeps counting, ignoring the reference value.

enumeratedValue.name: Enabled
enumeratedValue.description: The counter is cleared to 0 when the counter value is equal to the reference value.

enumeratedValue.name: Enabled
enumeratedValue.description: An interrupt is generated when the counter value is equal to the reference value.

enumeratedValue.name: Disabled
enumeratedValue.description: An overflow interrupt is not generated.

enumeratedValue.name: Enabled
enumeratedValue.description: An interrupt is generated when an overflow occurs.

field.name: COUNT
field.description: Counter Value. The counter value is incremented according to the conditions of the clock and the gate signal specified in the Tn_MODE.

field.name: COMP
field.description: Compare Value. Reference value to be compared with Tn_COUNT.

field.name: HOLD
field.description: Hold Value. The value of Tn_COUNT is copied when an SBUS interrupt occurs.

register.name: T1_MODE
register.description: Register for setting modes and reading status

register.name: T2_MODE
register.description: Register for setting modes and reading status

register.name: T3_MODE
register.description: Register for setting modes and reading status

enumeratedValue.name: WAITING
enumeratedValue.description: Waits for data following the VIFcode

enumeratedValue.name: PROCESSING
enumeratedValue.description: Decompressing/Transferring the data following the VIFcode

enumeratedValue.name: ERROR
enumeratedValue.description: Error (DMAtag has been detected in the VIF packet.)

field.name: FQC
field.description: Amount of effective data in the VIF-FIFO

enumeratedValue.name: Waiting
enumeratedValue.description: Waits for data following the VIFcode

enumeratedValue.name: PROCESSING
enumeratedValue.description: Decompressing/Transferring the data following the VIFcode

field.name: VGW
field.description: Status waiting for end of GIF transfer

enumeratedValue.name: WAIT
enumeratedValue.description: Wait (Stopped status with one of FLUSH/FLUSHA, DIRECT/DIRECTHL and MSCALF commands when GIF != idle.)

field.name: DBF
field.description: Double buffer flag. Cleared to 0 by OFFSET and reversed by MSCAL/MSCALF/MSCNT.

enumeratedValue.name: ERROR
enumeratedValue.description: Error (DMAtag has been detected in the VIF packet.)

field.name: FQC
field.description: Amount of effective data in the VIF-FIFO

field.name: RST
field.description: Reset. Resets the whole VIF (including VIF FIFO) when 1 is written.

field.name: FBK
field.description: ForceBreak. Causes a ForceBreak to the VIF when 1 is written. (Stall occurrence)

field.name: STP
field.description: Stop. Stops after end of VIDcode in process when 1 is written. (Stall occurrence)

field.name: STC
field.description: Stall Cancel. Cancels the VIF stall and clears the VSS, VFS, VIS, INT, ER0 and ER1 of the VIF_STAT register to 0 when 1 is written

field.name: MII
field.description: Masks an interrupt by the i bit of the VIFcode

field.name: M1
field.description: Row register value corresponding to the field

field.name: M2
field.description: Col register value corresponding to the write cycle

field.name: M5
field.description: Row register value corresponding to the field

field.name: M6
field.description: Col register value corresponding to the write cycle

field.name: M9
field.description: Row register value corresponding to the field

field.name: M10
field.description: Col register value corresponding to the write cycle

field.name: M13
field.description: Row register value corresponding to the field

field.name: M14
field.description: Col register value corresponding to the write cycle

field.name: R
field.description: Row data for filling when decompressing

field.name: C
field.description: Column data for filling when decompressing

enumeratedValue.name: CYCLE_8
enumeratedValue.description: Number of cycles to release the bbus to EE core when Cycle Stealing is on

enumeratedValue.name: CYCLE_16
enumeratedValue.description: Number of cycles to release the bbus to EE core when Cycle Stealing is on

enumeratedValue.name: CYCLE_32
enumeratedValue.description: Number of cycles to release the bbus to EE core when Cycle Stealing is on

enumeratedValue.name: CYCLE_64
enumeratedValue.description: Number of cycles to release the bbus to EE core when Cycle Stealing is on

enumeratedValue.name: CYCLE_128
enumeratedValue.description: Number of cycles to release the bbus to EE core when Cycle Stealing is on

enumeratedValue.name: CYCLE_256
enumeratedValue.description: Number of cycles to release the bbus to EE core when Cycle Stealing is on

peripheral.name: INTC
peripheral.description: Interrupt Controller. See EE User's Manual chapter 3.

field.name: GS
field.description: Detection of an interrupt from GS

field.name: SBUS
field.description: Detection of an interrupt from a peripheral on SBUS

field.name: VIF0
field.description: VIF0's detection of VIFcode with an interrupt bit or an exception, or VIF0 stalls with occurrence of an interrupt.

field.name: VIF1
field.description: VIF1's detection of VIFcode with an interrupt bit or an exception, or VIF1 stalls with occurrence of an interrupt.

field.name: VU0
field.description: VU0's execution of a microinstruction with an interrupt bit, or VU0 stalls with occurrence of an interrupt.

field.name: VU1
field.description: VU1's execution of a microinstruction with an interrupt bit, or VU1 stalls with occurrence of an interrupt.

field.name: IPU
field.description: IPU's detection of the end of data or an exception IPU stalls with occurrence of an interrupt.

field.name: VU0WD
field.description: VU0 in RUN status for a long time continuously; ForceBreak is sent to VU0.

enumeratedValue.name: Clear
enumeratedValue.description: No VU0 Watchdog interrupt has occurred.

enumeratedValue.name: Set
enumeratedValue.description: A VU0 Watchdog interrupt has occurred.

field.name: PGIF
field.description: DMA channel from IOP for emulating the PS1 GPU

field.name: GS
field.description: Detection of an interrupt from GS

field.name: SBUS
field.description: Detection of an interrupt from a peripheral on SBUS

enumeratedValue.name: Disabled
enumeratedValue.description: Start of V-Blank interrupts are disabled.

enumeratedValue.name: Enabled
enumeratedValue.description: Start of V-Blank interrupts are enabled.

enumeratedValue.name: Disabled
enumeratedValue.description: End of V-Blank interrupts are disabled.

enumeratedValue.name: Enabled
enumeratedValue.description: End of V-Blank interrupts are enabled.

field.name: VIF0
field.description: VIF0's detection of VIFcode with an interrupt bit or an exception, or VIF0 stalls with occurrence of an interrupt.

field.name: VIF1
field.description: VIF1's detection of VIFcode with an interrupt bit or an exception, or VIF1 stalls with occurrence of an interrupt.

field.name: VU0
field.description: VU0's execution of a microinstruction with an interrupt bit, or VU0 stalls with occurrence of an interrupt.

field.name: VU1
field.description: VU1's execution of a microinstruction with an interrupt bit, or VU1 stalls with occurrence of an interrupt.

field.name: IPU
field.description: IPU's detection of the end of data or an exception IPU stalls with occurrence of an interrupt.

field.name: VU0WD
field.description: VU0 in RUN status for a long time continuously; ForceBreak is sent to VU0.

field.name: PGIF
field.description: DMA channel from IOP for emulating the PS1 GPU
